game.name: NONEWORLD
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: NONEWORLD is a cute RPG set in a dying world. You are a Princess from another world, accompanied by an omnipresent Cheshire Cat. Only YOU and your fruity colored allies can LIGHT THE WORLD and return home safely.
game.shortDescriptionEn: NONEWORLD is a cute RPG set in a dying world. You are a Princess from another world, accompanied by an omnipresent Cheshire Cat. Only YOU and your fruity colored allies can LIGHT THE WORLD and return home safely.
